desc: A stunning collection of women's sterling silver vintage jewellery. Affordable high quality pieces. Predominantly art deco designs. Earrings, Rings, Necklaces, Bracelets and Pendants. Jewellery features marcasite, black onyx, turquoise, red carnelian, natural gemstones and cubic zirconia. Shop now.

layout.text: Find perfect day & night accessories to lift any outfit
